controls.title: Ensure configuration is set in situations
controls.desc:
Identify the threat actor and threat vector.
  
  Describe the mitigation.
  
  Note the external dependencies of the configuration.

descriptions.default:
Identify the threat actor and threat vector.
  
  Describe the mitigation.
  
  Note the external dependencies of the configuration.
descriptions.check:
Describe preconditions for conducting the check.
  
List each step of the check.

Identify mitigating factors.

Define success or failure conditions.
descriptions.fix:
Describe preconditions for changing the configuration.

List each step of applying the configuration.

Identify risks to confidentialty, integrity, or availability associated with applying the configuration.

controls.code:
control 'X-123456' do
  title 'Ensure configuration is set in situations'
  desc  "Identify the threat actor and threat vector.
  
  Describe the mitigation.
  
  Note the external dependencies of the configuration.
  "
  desc  'rationale', ''
  desc  'check', "Describe preconditions for conducting the check.
  
List each step of the check.

Identify mitigating factors.

Define success or failure conditions.
"
  desc  'fix', "
    Describe preconditions for changing the configuration.

    List each step of applying the configuration.

    Identify risks to confidentialty, integrity, or availability associated with applying the configuration.
  "
  impact 0.5
  tag severity: 'low'
  tag gtitle: 'SRG-APP-000220-ZZZ-567890'
  tag gid: 'gid_unused'
  tag rid: 'r1_rule'
  tag stig_id: 'stig_id_unused'
  tag fix_id: 'fix_id_unused'
  tag cci: ['CCI-001499', 'CCI-000197']
  tag legacy: ['V-72845', 'SV-87497']
  tag nist: ['CM-5 (6)', 'IA-5 (1) (c)']
end

controls.title:
Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for AWS Config
configuration changes
controls.desc:
Real-time monitoring of API calls can be achieved by directing
CloudTrail Logs to CloudWatch Logs and establishing corresponding metric
filters and alarms. It is recommended that a metric filter and alarm be
established for detecting changes to CloudTrail's configurations.

descriptions.default:
Real-time monitoring of API calls can be achieved by directing
CloudTrail Logs to CloudWatch Logs and establishing corresponding metric
filters and alarms. It is recommended that a metric filter and alarm be
established for detecting changes to CloudTrail's configurations.
